title: "Yes, Gangplank is finally dead!"
body:
{{champion:21}} " Vengeance is mine all mine and Bilgewater will be under my control! Ahahahahahahaha!"

{{champion:41}} "Curb ye enthusiasm you wretched wench. I live."

{{champion:21}} "Wait what? Impossible! I blew you to smithereens."

{{champion:41}} "Nah, just the lore department."

{{champion:21}} "Oh, I see." 

{{champion:41}} "Sucks to be them."

{{champion:21}} "Yup."

{{champion:41}} "Indeed."

{{champion:21}} "Aha...so where were we?"

{{champion:41}} "Hey look, a spooky ghost!"

{{champion:21}} "Where?"

{{champion:41}} "Right here you daft muppet. Only I'm not, because I'm alive."

{{champion:21}} "OH COME ON THIS IS BULLSHIT I WANT MY VENGEANCE!"

{{champion:41}} "I SHOT YOU IN THE CHEST AND HAVE THE GALL TO CALL ME COMING BACK BULLSHIT?"

{{champion:21}} "IT'S A NEW BRAND OF STORY TELLING!"

{{champion:63}} "Someone called?"

{{champion:41}} {{champion:21}} "FUCK OFF!!!"

{{champion:63}} "But there is a distinct lack of burning tides here in this story titled 'The Burning Tides.' _Burning...buuuuuurning._

{{champion:21}} "I don't even know what to say..."

{{champion:41}} "Orange?"

replies.body:
{{champion:1}} "Ok he said we were going to the zoo what's going on? We're on a ship."

{{champion:21}} "Oh god the firebugs are multiplying." 

{{champion:429}} "Did someone say VENGEANCE?"

{{champion:21}}  "You're a bit late." 

{{champion:429}} "I'VE BEEN BUSY. The amount of betrayal around here crying out for vengeance makes me sick. Happy to be working, but sick."

{{champion:41}} “Orange?”

{{champion:429}} “Silence! I am talking to the one who called me.”

{{champion:21}} “So you will help me take vengeance on the one who had slain my mother and almost me for what he desired?”

{{champion:429}} “Umm what?” 

{{champion:21}}  “That's what you're here for isn't it.”

{{champion:429}} “No I'm here to help you take vengeance on what you hate most.”

{{champion:21}} “He is here. He is literally right here in front of you.”

{{champion:429}} “But inside you that is not the case.”

{{champion:21}} “No you don't understand-”

{{champion:429}} “It is OK if you think that way, we can talk about this.”

*Kalista sits on a barrel and pulls out a pen and clipboard*

{{champion:429}} “So you think you hate this man more than anything”

{{champion:21}} “I can't believe we are having this conversation.”

{{champion:429}} “We're having a talk Sarah, just a talk and you can say whatever you want."

{{champion:21}} “I think you're not even listening to what I say.”

{{champion:429}} “Do you know what I think? I think what you hate most is the lore department. They are responsible for your suffering. Would you agree with that?"

{{champion:21}} “Well...”

{{champion:429}} "All you have to do is sign this contract that gives me your soul."

{{champion:21}} "Wait what?"

{{champion:63}} "Told you we were going to the zoo."

That feeling when you realize your attempt fell on it's face
The only thing funny about this was how garbage it is.

true , though it was an attempt.
